This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1529 Sq.
Experience a luxury lifestyle at Legacy Rental Homes in Pflugerville, Texas, conveniently located between Interstate Highway 35 and Tollway 130.
Enjoy the satisfaction of being close to everything with easy access to shopping, restaurants, entertainment, and outdoor recreation.
- Front Yard and Fenced Private Back Yards
- Stainless Steel Whirlpool Energy Efficient Appliances
- Farm White or Trendy Grey Cabinetry
- White Speckled or Slate Grey Quartz Countertops
- Park and Picnic Areas with Barbecue Grills
- Amenity Center and Clubhouse with Wi-Fi
